channel.title: Hosting help!
channel.description: Hello, I own a VPS which was used to host my old server. But for some reason there were not enough players for it to be worth keeping up. I was wandering if there are coders that need hosting? My old server was up for roughly 5 months we had a steady stream of players but never above 15+. I am reliable and pay in advance. This may not lead to anything, i was just wandering if there are coders that are happy to use someone elses VPS? Any feedback would be much apreciated.

item.title: Hosting help!
item.dc:creator: @ethanpk ethanpk
item.description:
@ethanpk wrote:

i will if ya don’t need to portforward…but im almost done coding my server just needa move the shops and home…

Read full topic

item.title: Hosting help!
item.dc:creator: @AssasinScape_Ftw AssasinScape Ftw
item.description:
@AssasinScape_Ftw wrote:

Hello, I own a VPS which was used to host my old server. But for some reason there were not enough players for it to be worth keeping up. I was wandering if there are coders that need hosting? My old server was up for roughly 5 months we had a steady stream of players but never above 15+. I am reliable and pay in advance. This may not lead to anything, i was just wandering if there are coders that are happy to use someone elses VPS? Any feedback would be much apreciated.

Read full topic
